review: I am disappointed that Amazon did not explain that to see more movies, one must purchase prime.I am also disappointed that Amazon did not explain that there would be movies and aps that would also require additional cost.If I had known the above, I would not have purchased the Fire TV Stick.
author: Jerry

review: wonderful little device however not clear how to make sure you are on Netflix if that's what you want. I am being billed for two episodes of the killing because I did not get onto the app so I am being billed $6 from Amazon for a mistake now realize that I have to go right onto the Netflix app otherwise its fun and it was easy to install thank you
author: Jane Osmers

review: I 'm thinking of cancelling cable!  Easy to set up, very easy to use!  So many choices to watch-what's not to love?
author: Reader babe "Sher"

review: Very easy install and now I have Fire TV on my second TV.  I love it.
author: SherryG of Tulsa "sherryg_ok"

review: Excellent quality. Works just as described. Good price.
author: bookintime "Wayne"

review: I love this.  Just plug into the TV and it works beautifully.
author: Kycatlady8

review: Works great. I have limited bandwith with my ISP and must cease all other internet activity when signing in to netflix. Once started there is no interruption in viewing even if I use other devises.
author: Donald Cooke

review: The remote is so simple!  Just a handful of buttons and all self-explanatory.  LOVE IT!
author: Mary Wood

review: Easy setup. Inexpensive. Learning curve involved.
author: Timothy Osting Sr.
